name: MoonRime Canyon
description:
In-Development GB game. 

Takes heavy inspiration from Stardew Valley.

Controls:

WASD- Directional movement

Z- A Button

X- B Button

Enter- Start

Shift- Select

You start the game with 5 seeds and a sword. There is only one shop in game (the one with the house symbol).

Menu and OST in the works.
